author: wsjcom
title: Focusing on LGBT Clients’ Planning Needs
text:
Cathy Pareto • President of Cathy Pareto & Associates, Miami • Education: B.B.A., M.B.A., Florida International University • Professional designations: Certified Financial Planner
Background: Ms. Pareto was inspired to a career in finance by witnessing her family’s money struggles as she grew up. But an early career in lending and credit issuance wasn’t the right fit. She pivoted to wealth management and after 10 years, Ms. Pareto knew it was time to strike out on her own. As a gay woman, she wanted to work with lesbian,...
